My Journey

With over 11 years of experience as a radiographer, I have cultivated a robust skill set that includes:
  • Mindset: Ensuring patient comfort and satisfaction has always been my top priority.
  • Adaptability: Thriving in dynamic environments and embracing new technologies and methodologies.
  • Team Player: Working effectively within multidisciplinary teams to achieve common goals.
  • Creative Problem Solving: Approaching challenges with innovative solutions.
  • Advocacy for Change: Recognizing the need for continuous improvement in healthcare practices.
  • Leadership: Believing that effective leadership is the cornerstone of successful healthcare services.
